body:
Comment 1: 
Setting GOPATH isn't compulsory, but it should perhaps be at least flagged in that doc.
It's described at the start of http://golang.org/doc/code.html, which is linked from the
install doc, but it does seem a bit odd to spread the environment variable setup stuff
over two docs.
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, **documentation**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
